channel.title: TIFF 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TIFF 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars: Palestine Picks ‘Palestine 36’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: Annemarie Jacir’s historical drama, which will premiere at the Toronto Film Festival, tells the story of the Palestinian revolt against British colonial rule.
